title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design and simulation of a propulsion system for a low-earth orbit satellite.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Detailed analysis of the combustion process in solid and liquid rocket engines.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket engine and perform simulations to test efficiency and thrust.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz on aerodynamics principles, including drag, lift, and airflow analysis.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Computational fluid dynamics project focusing on the analysis of air flow over an airfoil.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study and report on the heating effects during high-speed flight in the Earth's atmosphere.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Create a structural design for a small satellite, ensuring it can withstand launch loads.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform a set of orbital calculations to predict the trajectory of a satellite over time.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam that tests knowledge on the integration of spacecraft systems and lifecycle.

title: Spacecraft Dynamics Midterm
description: Midterm exam covering all aspects of spacecraft dynamics from the RS103 course. Topics include kinematics, orbital mechanics, and attitude control.
